author: remyroy
content: I just completed the first prototype for this. It's my first smart contract too. A Goerli deposit for 0.0001 GoETH <https://goerli.etherscan.io/tx/0x9809fd6908945ee6529e0e894b4cef56203ab76f7dad5c970d3ed0051e9f7d73>. We should be able to create a custom launchpad to use this proxy deposit contract soon.

author: remyroy
content: There is another farming threat with any process to help stakers do their deposit on Goerli once withdrawal is added. Deposit for cheap > withdraw your deposit ASAP > farm GoETH > win.

author: remyroy
content: This would be a long con to start working on this today, but we've seen a lot of unexpected behaviors around Goerli. Modifying the withdrawal credentials along the way might help if possible.

author: timbeiko
content: If someone needs GoETH to fund such a faucet at medium-scale, happy to provide it and see how long it lasts ðŸ˜…

author: remyroy
content: Our implementation is up! Try it and let us know. Cheap deposits can be whitelisted on your wallet address on https://discord.com/channels/694822223575384095/1026679645808119868/1026952485761454101 . Once you are whitelisted, you can do your deposits on this custom launchpad <https://goerli.launchpad.ethstaker.cc/>.
